name: Tourist Roller Coaster Simulation
description:
Experience a real adventure of roller coaster on your mobile device. Be a part of this crazy ride and enjoy thrill of rolling in air. The game is for all age group, let's download this free roller coaster. snowy and freezing environment will speed up your breath so enjoy this amazing and fast ride and drive your roller coaster as fast as you can. Game has multiple features like live 3d snow fall and manu more.

Feature

Advanced live snowy environment!
Runs smoothly on your devices!
Dynamic music wonít let you get bored!
Jump into trolley and letís start the ride!
High-speed, coaster loops!
Never-ending Game play with new turns!
